verses.verse: And He called <S%G4779><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> together, <S%G4779><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them power <S%G1411><s%> and authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the demons, <S%G1140><s%> and to heal <S%G2323><s%> diseases. <S%G3554><s%>
And He sent <S%G649><s%> them out to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and to perform <S%G2390><s%> healing. <S%G2390><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Take <S%G142><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> for [your] journey, <S%G3598><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> a staff, <S%G4464><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> a bag, <S%G4082><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> money; <S%G694><s%> and do not [even] have <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> tunics <S%G5509><s%> apiece. <S%G303><s%>
"And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> stay <S%G3306><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> and take <S%G1831><s%> your leave <S%G1831><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%>

"And as for those who do not receive <S%G1209><s%> you, as you go <S%G1831><s%> out from that city, <S%G4172><s%> shake <S%G660><s%> off <S%G660><s%> the dust <S%G2868><s%> from your feet <S%G4228><s%> as a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> them."

And departing, <S%G1831><s%> they [began] going <S%G1330><s%> about <S%G1330><s%> among <S%G2596><s%> the villages, <S%G2968><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> everywhere. <S%G3837><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5068><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that was happening; <S%G1096><s%> and he was greatly <S%G1280><s%> perplexed, <S%G1280><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> it was said <S%G3004><s%> by some <S%G5100><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> had risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%>

and by some <S%G5100><s%> that Elijah <S%G2243><s%> had appeared, <S%G5316><s%> and by others, <S%G243><s%> that one <S%G5100><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> of old <S%G744><s%> had risen <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

And Herod <S%G2264><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "I myself <S%G1473><s%> had John <S%G2491><s%> beheaded; <S%G607><s%> but who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I hear <S%G191><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things <S%G5108><s%>?" And he kept trying <S%G2212><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> Him.

And when the apostles <S%G652><s%> returned, <S%G5290><s%> they gave <S%G1334><s%> an account <S%G1334><s%> to Him of all <S%G3745><s%> that they had done. <S%G4160><s%> And taking <S%G3880><s%> them with Him, He withdrew <S%G5298><s%> by Himself <S%G2398><s%> to a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Bethsaida. <S%G966><s%>

But the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were aware <S%G1097><s%> of this and followed <S%G190><s%> Him; and welcoming <S%G588><s%> them, He [began] speaking <S%G2980><s%> to them about <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and curing <S%G2390><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of healing. <S%G2322><s%>

And the day <S%G2250><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to decline, <S%G2827><s%> and the twelve <S%G1427><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Send <S%G630><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that they may go <S%G4198><s%> into the surrounding <S%G2945><s%> villages <S%G2968><s%> and countryside <S%G68><s%> and find <S%G2647><s%> lodging <S%G2647><s%> and get <S%G2147><s%> something <S%G1979><s%> to eat; <S%G1979><s%> for here <S%G5602><s%> we are in a desolate <S%G2048><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>"

But He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You give <S%G1325><s%> them [something] to eat! <S%G2068><s%>" And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "We have no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3385><s%> perhaps <S%G3385><s%> we go <S%G4198><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>"

(For there were about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand <S%G4000><s%> men. <S%G435><s%>) And He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Have them recline <S%G2625><s%> [to eat] in groups <S%G2828><s%> of about <S%G5616><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%> each. <S%G303><s%>"
And they did <S%G4160><s%> so, <S%G3779><s%> and had them all <S%G537><s%> recline. <S%G2625><s%>

And He took <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> and looking <S%G308><s%> up to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> He blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, and broke <S%G2622><s%> [them,] and kept giving <S%G1325><s%> [them] to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

And they all <S%G3956><s%> ate <S%G2068><s%> and were satisfied; <S%G5526><s%> and the broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces <S%G2801><s%> which they had left <S%G4052><s%> over <S%G4052><s%> were picked <S%G142><s%> up, twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> [full.]

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that while <S%G1722><s%> He was praying <S%G4336><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were with Him, and He questioned <S%G1905><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> do the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%>?"

And they answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist, <S%G910><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> [say] Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> but others, <S%G243><s%> that one <S%G5100><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> of old <S%G744><s%> has risen <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "But who <S%G5101><s%> do you say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%>?" And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "The Christ <S%G5547><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
But He warned <S%G2008><s%> them, and instructed <S%G3853><s%> [them] not to tell <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> to anyone, <S%G3367><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things, <S%G4183><s%> and be rejected <S%G593><s%> by the elders <S%G4245><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be killed, <S%G615><s%> and be raised <S%G1453><s%> up on the third <S%G5154><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to [them] all, <S%G3956><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Me, let him deny <S%G720><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross <S%G4716><s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> Me.

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it, but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for My sake, <S%G1752><s%> he is the one who will save <S%G4982><s%> it.

"For what <S%G5101><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> profited <S%G5623><s%> if he gains <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and loses <S%G622><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> forfeits <S%G2210><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>?

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> is ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of Me and My words, <S%G3056><s%> of him will the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be ashamed <S%G1870><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> He comes <S%G2064><s%> in His glory, <S%G1391><s%> and [the glory] of the Father <S%G3962><s%> and of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>

"But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you truthfully, <S%G230><s%> there are some <S%G5100><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G847><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> shall not taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> they see <S%G3708><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And some <S%G5616><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> sayings, <S%G3056><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> about that He took <S%G3880><s%> along <S%G3880><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and went <S%G305><s%> up to the mountain <S%G3735><s%> to pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And while <S%G1722><s%> He was praying, <S%G4336><s%> the appearance <S%G1491><s%> of His face <S%G4383><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> different, <S%G2087><s%> and His clothing <S%G2441><s%> [became] white <S%G3022><s%> [and] gleaming. <S%G1823><s%>
And behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> were talking <S%G4814><s%> with Him; and they were Moses <S%G3475><s%> and Elijah, <S%G2243><s%>

who, <S%G3739><s%> appearing <S%G3708><s%> in glory, <S%G1391><s%> were speaking <S%G3004><s%> of His departure <S%G1841><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He was about <S%G3195><s%> to accomplish <S%G4137><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and his companions <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4862><s%> had been <S%G1510><s%> overcome <S%G916><s%> with sleep; <S%G5258><s%> but when they were fully <S%G1235><s%> awake, <S%G1235><s%> they saw <S%G3708><s%> His glory <S%G1391><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> standing <S%G4921><s%> with Him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about, as these <S%G846><s%> were parting <S%G1316><s%> from Him, Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "Master, <S%G1988><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%> for us to be here; <S%G5602><s%> and let us make <S%G4160><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> tabernacles: <S%G4633><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> for You, and one <S%G1520><s%> for Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> for Elijah <S%G2243><s%>" â€“ not realizing <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he was saying. <S%G3004><s%>

And while he was saying <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> formed <S%G1096><s%> and [began] to overshadow <S%G1982><s%> them; and they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> as they entered <S%G1525><s%> the cloud. <S%G3507><s%>

And a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out of the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is My Son, <S%G5207><s%> [My] Chosen <S%G1586><s%> One; listen <S%G191><s%> to Him!"

And when <S%G1722><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> had spoken, <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%> And they kept <S%G4601><s%> silent, <S%G4601><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> to no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> of the things which <S%G3739><s%> they had seen. <S%G3708><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about on the next <S%G1836><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> that when they had come <S%G2718><s%> down <S%G2718><s%> from the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> Him.

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> from the multitude <S%G3793><s%> shouted <S%G994><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> I beg <S%G1189><s%> You to look <S%G1914><s%> at my son, <S%G5207><s%> for he is my only <S%G3439><s%> [boy,]

and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> seizes <S%G2983><s%> him, and he suddenly <S%G1810><s%> screams, <S%G2896><s%> and it throws <S%G4682><s%> him into a convulsion <S%G4682><s%> with foaming <S%G876><s%> [at the mouth,] and as it mauls <S%G4937><s%> him, it scarcely <S%G3433><s%> leaves <S%G672><s%> him.
"And I begged <S%G1189><s%> Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> it out, and they could <S%G1410><s%> not."

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "O <S%G5599><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%> and perverted <S%G1294><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> how <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G2193><s%> <S%G4219><s%> shall I be with you, and put <S%G430><s%> up with you? Bring <S%G4317><s%> your son <S%G5207><s%> here. <S%G5602><s%>"

And while he was still <S%G2089><s%> approaching, <S%G4334><s%> the demon <S%G1140><s%> dashed <S%G4486><s%> him [to the ground,] and threw <S%G4952><s%> him into a convulsion. <S%G4952><s%> But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and healed <S%G2390><s%> the boy, <S%G3816><s%> and gave <S%G591><s%> him back <S%G591><s%> to his father. <S%G3962><s%>

And they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G1605><s%> at the greatness <S%G3168><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> But while everyone <S%G3956><s%> was marveling <S%G2296><s%> at all <S%G3956><s%> that He was doing, <S%G4160><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

" Let these <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> sink <S%G5087><s%> into your ears; <S%G3775><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is going <S%G3195><s%> to be delivered <S%G3860><s%> into the hands <S%G5495><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>"

But they did not understand <S%G50><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> statement, <S%G4487><s%> and it was concealed <S%G3871><s%> from them so <S%G2443><s%> that they might not perceive <S%G143><s%> it; and they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> to ask <S%G2065><s%> Him about <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> statement. <S%G4487><s%>
And an argument <S%G1261><s%> arose <S%G1525><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them as to which <S%G5101><s%> of them might be the greatest. <S%G3173><s%>

But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G1261><s%> they were thinking <S%G1261><s%> in their heart, <S%G2588><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> a child <S%G3813><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> him by His side, <S%G3844><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> child <S%G3813><s%> in My name <S%G3686><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> Me; and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> Me receives <S%G1209><s%> Him who sent <S%G649><s%> Me; for he who is least <S%G3398><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, this <S%G3778><s%> is the one who is great. <S%G3173><s%>"

And John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Master, <S%G1988><s%> we saw <S%G3708><s%> someone <S%G5100><s%> casting <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> in Your name; <S%G3686><s%> and we tried to hinder <S%G2967><s%> him because <S%G3754><s%> he does not follow <S%G190><s%> along with us."
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Do not hinder <S%G2967><s%> [him;] for he who <S%G3739><s%> is not against <S%G2596><s%> you is for you."

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about, when <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> were approaching <S%G4845><s%> for His ascension, <S%G354><s%> that He resolutely <S%G4741><s%> set <S%G4741><s%> His face <S%G4383><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem; <S%G2419><s%>

and He sent <S%G649><s%> messengers <S%G32><s%> on ahead <S%G4253><s%> <S%G4383><s%> of Him. And they went, <S%G4198><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> a village <S%G2968><s%> of the Samaritans, <S%G4541><s%> to make <S%G2090><s%> arrangements <S%G2090><s%> for Him.
And they did not receive <S%G1209><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> He was journeying <S%G4198><s%> with His face <S%G4383><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And when His disciples <S%G3101><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> [this,] they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> do You want <S%G2309><s%> us to command <S%G3004><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> to come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> and consume <S%G355><s%> them?"
But He turned <S%G4762><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them, [and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You do not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> kind <S%G4169><s%> of spirit <S%G4151><s%> you are of;
